/**
     * Parses a string to produce a {@link Fraction} object.
     * @param source the string to parse
     * @return the parsed {@link Fraction} object.
     * @exception ParseException if the beginning of the specified string
     *            cannot be parsed.
     */

/**
     * Access the whole format.
     * @return the whole format.
     */

/** * Returns the sign * for byte value x. *

* For a byte value x, this method returns (byte)(+1) if x > 0, (byte)(0) if * x = 0, and (byte)(-1) if x < 0. * * @param x the value, a byte * @return (byte)(+1), (byte)(0), or (byte)(-1), depending on the sign of x */
